co.paralleluniverse.capsule.container

Class CapsuleContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.capsule.container.CapsuleContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CapsuleContainerMXBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MBeanCapsuleContainer

    public class CapsuleContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CapsuleContainerMXBean
    Launches, monitors and manages capsules.
